text: 使徒、神の使い、天使の名を持つ、僕らの敵…
translation: Angels... messengers of God, bearing the names of angels, our enemies...
grammar: の名を持つ - 'bearing the name of', possessive の links concepts; ellipsis (...) indicates trailing thought

text: なんで戦うんだろ? / あんたバカ?訳わかんない連中が攻めてきてんのよ! / 降りかかるヒノコは払いのけるのが当たり前じゃない / うーん
translation: I wonder why we fight? / Are you stupid? These incomprehensible guys are attacking us! / It's natural to brush off sparks that fall on you, isn't it? / Hmm...

vocabulary.meaning: to brush off, to sweep away

grammar: んだろ - casual form of のだろう (wondering); てんのよ - explanatory のよ with てる contracted to てん; じゃない - rhetorical question expecting agreement

text: 右ね / 私は左だと思うわ / うるさいわね / シンジはどうなのよ / あの
translation: To the right / I think it's to the left / You're annoying / What do you think, Shinji? / Um...
grammar: だと思う - 'I think that...'; のよ - feminine sentence-ending particle; わね - feminine particle combination (わ + ね)

text: どっちかな / もう / 私がリーダーなんだから黙ってついてくればいいのよ
translation: Which way... / Ugh! / I'm the leader, so you should just shut up and follow me
grammar: んだから - explanatory ん + だから (because/since); ければいい - conditional + いい expresses 'should just do...'

text: やっぱり変だよ / 上り坂だよここ / やっぱりとは何よ / いちいちうるさい男ね
translation: I knew something was weird / This is an uphill slope / What do you mean 'I knew'? / You're such a nitpicky guy

vocabulary.meaning: one by one, every little thing

grammar: やっぱり - colloquial やはり; とは何よ - とは emphasizes 'what do you mean by...'; いちいち modifies うるさい for emphasis

text: ほら今度こそ間違いないわ
translation: Look, THIS time there's no mistake
grammar: こそ - emphatic particle meaning 'this time for sure'; ない - negative form of ある

text: 死とを肉眼で確認 / これで削がなきゃいけないのが分かったでしょ
translation: Angel confirmed with the naked eye / Now you understand why we have to fight, right?
grammar: なきゃいけない - contraction of なければいけない (must do); のが分かった - nominalizer の makes the clause the subject of 分かる; でしょ - casual form of でしょう (right?)

text: 現在首都接近中 / 直ちにエヴァ発進の4割とは認める / 大変
translation: Currently approaching the Angel / Approve Eva launch preparations immediately / This is bad
grammar: 中 - suffix indicating ongoing action; 4割 likely transcription error for 準備 (preparations)

text: 冬月後を頼む / いいかい / 私は刑事でエヴァの発進準備を進めておく / まさか / 手動でか / 緊急用のディーゼルがある / しかし
translation: Fuyutsuki, I'm counting on you / Understood / I'll proceed with Eva launch preparations at the cage / You can't mean... / Manually? / We have emergency diesel generators / But...
grammar: ておく - preparatory て-form indicating doing something in advance; まさか - expresses disbelief; でか - particle で + か for questioning means

text: パイロットが / いないぞ
translation: The pilots... / aren't here

vocabulary.meaning: to not be present (for animate objects)

grammar: ぞ - masculine emphatic sentence-ending particle; が marks the subject; pause with / indicates concern

text: まただ / こっちよ
translation: Another dead end / This way
grammar: だ - copula; よ - directive particle; context implies まただ means 'another (dead end/wrong turn)'

text: あんた、イカリ司令のお気に入りなんですってね
translation: You're Commander Ikari's favorite, aren't you?
grammar: なんですって - hearsay んですって (I heard that...); ね - seeking confirmation

text: やっぱ可愛がられてる優等生は違うわね / こんな時にやめようよ
translation: As expected, a pet honor student is different / Stop it at a time like this
grammar: られてる - passive られる contracted to られてる (being favored); やめようよ - volitional + よ suggests 'let's stop'

text: いつもすまし顔でいられるしさ
translation: You can always keep that calm face, after all

vocabulary.meaning: can be/remain (potential form of いる)

grammar: でいられる - potential form of でいる (can remain in a state); し - particle listing reasons; さ - casual masculine filler particle

text: あんた!ちょっと悲喜にされてるからってなめないでよ!
translation: You! Don't look down on me just because the Commander favors you a little!

vocabulary.meaning: favor (likely meant to be 贔屓 - ひいき)

grammar: されてる - passive contracted form; からって - から + って emphasizes causal relationship dismissively; ないでよ - negative request with feminine よ

text: なめてなんかいないわ / それに悲喜もされてない
translation: I'm not looking down on you at all / Besides, I'm not being favored either
grammar: てなんか - て-form + なんか for emphatic negation 'not doing... at all'; もされてない - も adds 'also/either' to negative

text: 自分でわかるもの
translation: I can tell myself
grammar: もの - sentence-final particle providing explanation/justification, often feminine

text: 了解停止信号プラグ排出終了
translation: Roger. Stop signal. Plug ejection complete
grammar: Technical military/operation jargon; compound nouns linked without particles for brevity

text: よし3機ともエントリープラグ挿入準備 / しかし未だにパイロットが
translation: Alright, prepare to insert entry plugs for all three units / But the pilots still haven't...
grammar: とも - particle meaning 'both/all'; 準備 used as noun (no verb); sentence trails off with concern

text: 大丈夫あの子たちは必ず来るわ
translation: It's okay, those children will definitely come
grammar: あの子たち - affectionate plural; わ - feminine confident assertion

text: これは / 手じゃ開けられないよ / 仕方ないわ
translation: This is... / We can't open it by hand / It can't be helped

vocabulary.meaning: it can't be helped, no choice

grammar: じゃ - では contracted; られない - potential negative (can't be opened); 仕方ない - idiomatic expression of resignation

text: ダクトを破壊してそこから進みましょう / ファーストって怖い子ね
translation: Let's destroy the duct and proceed from there / First is a scary girl, isn't she?
grammar: ましょう - polite volitional (let's); って - casual quotative/topic marker; ね - seeking agreement

text: 目的のためには手段を選ばないタイプ / いわゆる独善者ね
translation: The type who doesn't choose means for her goals / A so-called self-righteous person
grammar: のためには - 'for the sake of' with は for emphasis/contrast; いわゆる - 'so-called'

text: フラグ固定準備完了 / あとはあの子たちね
translation: Plug securing preparations complete / Now it's just those children left
grammar: フラグ - should be プラグ (plug); あとは - 'as for what remains'; ね - confirmatory particle

text: ぜーったいに前見ないでよ / 見たら殺すわよ / バカバカバカ / 見るなんて言ったでしょ / 仕方ない / だよ / 前見なきゃすぐ
translation: Absolutely don't look forward! / If you look, I'll kill you! / Idiot, idiot, idiot! / I told you not to look! / I can't help it / I know / If I don't look forward I'll trip right away
grammar: ぜーったい - elongated for emphasis; ないでよ - negative request; たら - conditional (if you do); なんて - quotative showing disbelief; なきゃ - contracted なければ (if not)

text: あんたたち
translation: You guys...
grammar: Trailing off implies exasperation or relief at seeing them

text: 各機エントリー準備 / 了解 始動で発揮開け / ウェバー! / スタンバイできてるわ
translation: Entry preparations for all units / Roger, open launch ports at startup / Ritsuko! / I'm on standby
grammar: で - particle indicating point/timing; できてる - completion/state of readiness; technical jargon throughout

text: あ、もう動かないのに / 人の手でね / 司令のアイデアよ / 父さんの
translation: Ah, even though the power isn't working / By human hands / It was the Commander's idea / Father's...
grammar: のに - 'even though' expresses contrast; で - particle of means; の - possessive trailing off with emotion

text: イカリ司令はあなたたちが来ることを信じて準備してたのよ
translation: Commander Ikari believed you would come and prepared for it
grammar: ことを - nominalizer making 'coming' the object of 信じる; て - connecting two actions in sequence; てた - contracted ていた (was doing); のよ - explanatory feminine particle
